Html:
Html Agility Pack was recommended to me as a solution from another board.
I'm working on a C# winform app and I would like to pull down the favorites icon of any given website to be stored on the users local drive.

Can I get this done with Htmal Agility Pack?

<link rel="icon" href="/favicon.ico" type="image/x-icon" />
and/or
<link rel="SHORTCUT ICON" href="../favicon.ico" />
